document.full_text: rod blagojevich greeted old friends and reporters in court on thursday as the judge presiding over the former illinois governor's corruption trial began questioning prospective jurors.
document.title: blagojevich watches jury selection for corruption trial
lines_and_colors: rod blagojevich greeted old friends and reporters in court on thursday as the judge presiding over the former illinois governor's corruption trial began questioning prospective jurors.
